1.title: Classic C-10 Dyno and Track Test
1.plot: Team wraps up its classic C-10 build, then pays it off at NCM Motorsports Park.

2.title: Workahauler F-150
2.plot: How to build a real work truck from a late-model F-150. Also, how to blend paint on a repaired fender.

3.title: Suspension Overhaul
3.plot: Upgrading the suspension, wheels and tires on our Workahauler F-150, plus how to buy a used truck.

4.title: SuperMax Shrink
4.plot: GM never offered a short box Duramax. So we take an '03 and chop the frame for the smaller bed. Plus the payoff of Project Workahauler F-150.

5.title: Project Preview
5.plot: The guys give a sneak peak at projects for the upcoming season, along with showing how to start a barn find that has been sitting for a long time.

6.title: SuperMax Stage 1 Upgrades
6.plot: Our '03 Duramax is back for stage one performance enhancements including intake and exhaust upgrades. Plus fixing a bad body repair.

7.title: Klassy K5 Introduction & Teardown
7.plot: We introduce our '89 Blazer with a raucous trail ride to show capabilities of Chevy's full size 4x4 in stock form. Then we bring it back, tear it down, and begin building the ultimate trail/show fun truck.

8.title: SuperMax Rust Repair & Paint Prep
8.plot: Buyer beware. Hidden rust is discovered under the paint of our diesel Silverado. We get this truck one step closer to paint by repairing cab corners and showing how to replace rocker panels.

9.title: Identity Crisis Engine and Trans
9.plot: Our '67 El Camino project begins with teardown for paint prep. Plus, a beefy 6 liter LQ4 truck engine built on Engine Power gets dropped in along with turbo 350 racing trans.

10.title: Identity Crisis Custom Paint
10.plot: Step by step how-to design and laydown a show quality paint job. Techniques include metal flake, ghost flames, fades and a way to create water dropplet fx.

13.title: FORD MODEL a TRUCK CHASSIS
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: KLASSY K5 FRAME Repair AXLES
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: 4x4 Altitude
1.plot: Installing a 4" suspension lift on a late model Tundra.

2.title: Raptor & Tremor
2.plot: Driving impressions & Ford Racing exhaust upgrade.

3.title: Jeep Refresh
3.plot: Tired Cherokee gets sheet metal & broken rim repair.

4.title: Jeep Facelift
4.plot: Paint matching and how to dye leather seats.

5.title: Senior Silverado
5.plot: From 260,000 mile work horse to sweet sport truck.

6.title: In the Weeds
6.plot: How to lower a half-ton Chevy front & rear.

7.title: Sheet Metal Mods
7.plot: Fixing rusted doors, rockers & a new roll pan.

8.title: Sr. Silverado: Smoother front & rear
8.plot: Custom sport truck tech - a smooth front bumper and grill install, plus how-to smooth the tail gate with an inside latch.

9.title: Project: "Basket Case F100"
9.plot: The guys start their next classic build finding a disassembled '55 F100. They save cash and time reviving this abandoned project.

10.title: Senior Silverado: Perfect Paint Prep
10.plot: The guys show how and why pre-paint body work and surface prepare the secret behind achieving a killer paint job.

11.title: Senior Silverado: Heart Transplant
11.plot: The 350 in our 260,000 mile Chevy gets yanked out and replaced with a 383 Stroker crate short block, hot cam and new EFI.

12.title: 4 Speed Tutorial: GM's 4L60-E
12.plot: What you need to know about how to rebuild and upgrade GM's 4L60E four speed automatic overdrive transmission.

13.title: Senior Silverado: Drivetrain Finale
13.plot: Failsafe tech on how-to swap in, and dial in a street performance automatic transmission and complete the driveline.

14.title: : V6 to V8 Swap
14.plot: How-to man-up a Jeep Wrangler by plucking out the anemic 3.8L V6 and replacing it with a late model Hemi V8.

15.title: : V8 Swap Completion
15.plot: Tech details on completing a Jeep Hemi engine swap with how-to integrate new cooling, fuel, electrical and exhaust systems.

16.title: : Mid-Arm Articulation
16.plot: How-to lift our Hemi Jeep with mid-arm suspension and a Dana 44 front diff for more articulation and grip.

17.title: Senior Silverado: Out on the Streets
17.plot: Low buck Chevy Sport Truck gets shake down on the street after converting from open diff to limited slip.

18.title: Hemi JK: Rock Ready
18.plot: We complete our V8 Hemi Wrangler project making it trail ready with big brakes, rock sliders, bulletproof bumpers and tire carrier.

19.title: : The Payoff
19.plot: Hybrid six wheel Ford body/Dodge Cummins diesel rolls out of the shop for its maiden asphalt twisting payoff.

20.title: : Pro Street Prep
20.plot: Team fabs S10 with street/strip chassis mods, cage and big brakes to cradle nitrous fed Chevy big block.

21.title: Hemi JK: Payoff
21.plot: Hemi Jeep gets Dana 44s with air lockers then a payoff in the rough with off-road suspension designer Rusty Megois.

22.title: Classic Chevy/Modern Ford
22.plot: A '54 five window Chevy gets cooling system upgrade and team dyno tunes 75 extra ponies from EcoBoost V6.

23.title: F100 Basket Case: Hot Rod Classic
23.plot: Classic 1955 Ford pickup gets modern custom chassis to hold turbocharged Eco-Boost from a modern F150. Classic 1955 Ford pickup gets modern custom chassis to hold turbocharged Eco-Boost from a modern F150. Classic 1955 Ford pickup gets modern custom chassis to hold turbocharged Eco-Boost from a modern F150. Classic 1955 Ford pickup gets modern custom chassis to hold turbocharged Eco-Boost from a modern F150.

1.title: Project Basket Case: Eco Boost
1.plot: How to fabricate custom motor mounts to swap an Eco Boost V6 and Tremec 5 speed into a classic F100.

2.title: Custom 9" Rear Gear
2.plot: How to build and hang a custom 9" Ford rear end and big brakes to handle turbocharged Eco Boost V6.

3.title: Project NighTrain - Diesel Swap
3.plot: Turning a classic Chevy C10 into a street bruiser swapping in a Duramax diesel with Allison 6 speed automatic.

4.title: Wider is Better
4.plot: Custom shop tech on how-to widen pickup fenders to make room for fatter tires and still keep the classic look.

5.title: Ultra Cheap Paint Job
5.plot: How to transform an old Dodge Cummins work truck with new paint in a weekend for under $500 bucks.

6.title: Sonic Suspension
6.plot: Using microphones to detect suspension problems and how off-road suspensions are designed and tested.

7.title: Project NighTrain - Boxing the Frame
7.plot: How to box the frame of a Chevy 1500 to handle the extra power and torque of a modern Duramax diesel V8 engine.

8.title: Wrangler Re-do: 2WD to 4WD
8.plot: Ryan lifts '07 Wrangler, converts it a to 4WD and installs an Advanced Adapters under-drive crawl box.

9.title: BigFoot Lives
9.plot: After 23 years in retirement, original BigFoot monster truck comes alive with new transmission and blown engine.

10.title: Wrangler Re-do: Axles
10.plot: Ryan completes 4WD conversion with new Currie front axle, heavy duty driveshafts and performance brakes.

11.title: F100 Basket Case: Spark
11.plot: Ryan's F100 gets electronic control pack activating Eco Boost turbo V6, and a custom cats-only exhaust.

12.title: Wrangler Re-do: Performance
12.plot: Dual purpose '07 Jeep gets bolt-on performance upgrades, tuner, trail lighting and stainless steel exhaust.

13.title: Wrangler Re-do: Payoff
13.plot: Ryan finishes his modified Jeep street/trail rig with a sport top and tests it out on the streets and the trails.

14.title: Project NighTrain: Paint Repair
14.plot: 1987 1500 with DuraMax diesel gets de-laminated paint repaired, a cowl hood, weld-in roll pan and new front end treatment.

15.title: Project: Wild Frontier
15.plot: Team preps Frontier 4x4 for hunting with 6" lift, air locker, gears, 35" rubber and upgraded brakes.

16.title: Classic Chevy Hop Up
16.plot: 53 pickup with Stovebolt six gets dual carb intake, cast iron header, front disc brake kit and new hoops.

17.title: Wild Frontier: Payoff
17.plot: Team adds GPS off-road mapping system to V6 Nissan and heads into the back country to prep for hunting season.

18.title: Classic Chevy Paint Repair & Payoff
18.plot: We're timing the 235 straight 6 in our '53 3100 and repairing the weather worn paint before hitting the streets for a fun drive in our classic pickup.

19.title: NighTrain: Suspension
19.plot: Team drops and levels Duramax diesel 1500 with 2"/4" lowering kit and swaps out anemic factory 10-bolt rear.

20.title: F150 Wake Up
20.plot: Guys turn up the wick on a stock F150 EcoBoost adding 69 HP with a cold air kit, exhaust and tuner.

21.title: Classic F100 Updates
21.plot: Jeremy and LT prep cab for custom paint, install electric power steering and a custom gas tank.

22.title: NighTrain: Fire Up
22.plot: Guys fabricate intercooler plumbing, custom fuel lines and custom exhaust as we fire up our Duramax diesel.

23.title: DIY Driveway Projects
23.plot: Team shows how to save big money by replacing your own CV axle bearings, water pump and AC condenser.

1.title: Project Basket Case Fire Up & NighTrain Plumbing
1.plot: Firing an EcoBoost in bare chassis and custom plumb a Duramax cooling system.

2.title: Project Basket Case Body Mockup and Paint Prep
2.plot: The '55 F100 is assembled and body worked for paint.

3.title: Project Hemi-Hauler: Supercharger and Exhaust
3.plot: Our 2013 Ram half-ton gasser gets a supercharger and high flow exhaust, plus hammer/dolly body tips.

4.title: NighTrain Payoff & Budget Silverado
4.plot: Diesel NighTrain hits the strip for a smokin' payoff and cam swap and tune of our '10 Silverado "Project White Noize".

5.title: Suspension Drop 101 Leafs vs Links
5.plot: Lowering kits are installed on two half ton pick-ups. A 2013 Ram gets a 2/4 drop and a 2010 Silverado 4/6 drop.

6.title: Hemi Hauler Payoff
6.plot: After major intake upgrades, lowering kit and more the '13 Ram is back for stereo upgrades, lights and payoff.

7.title: '71 C-10 Part 1
7.plot: A classic C-10 is introduced and treated to air suspension on all four corners.

8.title: JK Wrangler Upgrades
8.plot: A boring 4 door Jeep is turned into a dual purpose fun wagon with lift, performance tune, exhaust and more.

9.title: Project C-10 - Reassembly
9.plot: This classic pickup returns for custom brakes, fuel system plus cab repair.

10.title: Project Basket Case Intercooler Fab & Frame Paint
10.plot: Our '55 F100 gets a custom fabricated intercooler before the truck is blown apart frame treated to full-on professional paint job.

11.title: Drivetrain Upgrades
11.plot: The sleeper Silverado returns for trans swap, axle upgrades including "gearing 101".

12.title: Gets Forced Induction
12.plot: Our sleeper Silverado is awakened by forced induction with the addition of a turbocharger, 4 inch exhaust and more.

13.title: Project Basket Case - Paint & Body
13.plot: With our '55 F100 blown apart for paint, our guys tackle last minute metal work before step-by-step process of laying down color.

14.title: JK Wrangler Upgrades PT. II and Basket Case Wood Bed
14.plot: Our Jeep gets LED's before hitting the trail, and Jeremy uses his custom paint skills to add a unique color treatment to the pick-up's wood bed.

15.title: Project Basket Case Wiring and C10 Plumbing and Exhaust
15.plot: Basket case is wired bumper to bumper while the Chevy C10 is plumbed and given a custom cutout exhaust.

16.title: 71 C10 Rust Repair and Final Assembly Before Paint
16.plot: Classic C10 Chevy gets treated to rust repair, painted firewall before prepping for paint as a fully assembled truck.

17.title: Project Basket Case - Custom Interior
17.plot: How to turn junkyard bucket seats into show-quality upholstery for our F100. Plus how low-cost sheet metal can transform your old pick up bed.

18.title: 71 C10 Interior & Bed Assembly
18.plot: Our C10 Chevy gets bed assembled, cut for exhaust exits and a fresh interior. Plus relocating the gas filler by shaving the factory hole.

19.title: Emissions Mission, C10 Faux-tina Paint
19.plot: Fail an emissions test? Quick fixes to get you passed. Plus our C10 gets painted to look old with fauxtina treatment.

20.title: Project Basket Case: Custom Cut Glass & Final Assembly
20.plot: A chopped top begs for a custom cut windshield, Glass Guy Chicago will show us how it's done. Plus the rest of the truck is assembled before the big payoff and auction.

21.title: C10 Gets Fired Up
21.plot: Our '71 C10 goes through final assembly and fire up, plus how to turn a vintage Cadillac bench into a tuck and roll couch for your man-cave.

22.title: Ram Jam
22.plot: Our '01 Ram is back for leveling kit and brake upgrades, plus how to turn a vintage Cadillac bench into a tuck and roll couch for your man-cave.

23.title: F100 Finale
23.plot: The '55 F100 gets its virgin shakedown run, then we'll trailer her to Louisville's Mecum Auction where she hits the sale block to the highest bidder.

imdb.title: PowerNation: Truck Tech
plot: Expert techs Lawrence "LT" Tolman and Jeremy Bumpus demonstrate how to restore, modify, customize and paint classic and late model 2- and 4-wheel drive pickups, sport trucks, and SUVs.
